name: Fabricjs-turtle
body:
fabricjs-turtle
===============

turtle graphics class for Fabric.js

A first shot of a turtle graphics class for Fabric.js, this is not quite a class yet since it lacks real instanaces and it references a global canvas object, which has to be create with fabric.Canvas

This script is also visible at http://jsfiddle.net/alexlehm/cmM79/, the output looks like this
![example](http://31.media.tumblr.com/60fd7fd3e1ff4db52be693e378ed4cae/tumblr_mxb4u9ZM381qzftxdo1_1280.png)

This was mainly created as an entry to the [challengepost](http://fabricjs.challengepost.com/) competition of [Fabric.js](http://fabricjs.com/) (since I was a fan of turtle graphics since the c64 days, it seems like a good idea).

The whole script could use a lot of improvement including comments and docs, the examples show the usual graphics.

Alexander Lehmann <alexlehm@gmail.com>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
